title: Mark Knopfler Guitar Styles - Volume 1
description: (Guitar Recorded Versions). This great collection features complete note-for-note transcriptions of 8 Knopfler Expresso Love * Love over Gold * Once upon a Time in the West * Private Investigations * Romeo and Juliet * Sultans of Swing * Telegraph Road * Tunnel of Love. Also includes an in-depth interview, info on Mark's guitars, exclusive color photos, and a guide to tab.
author: Mark Knopfler
